mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adgomin_user (email, password, nickname, user_type, marketing_yn, use_yn, create_dt, modify_dt, certified) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{userType}, #{marketingYn}, "1", now(), now(), #{certified})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS count FROM adgomin_user WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email}
